Could you tell your COVID safety protocols?
I would like to know about the cleanliness of the restaurant
I am concerned about the COVID related sanitization
Is it safe to eat out in this pandemic?
i am concerned about the cleanliness
responses:
I understand your concern. We are following all the COVID safety norms and guidlines by the government, Your safety is our priority: 
 1. All our staff is double masked 24x7. 
 2. All our staff is checked for fevers and other symptoms daily. 
 3. All surfaces are frequently sanitized. 
 4. We use this friendly bot to reduce physical closeness to the least!
